От этой игры у меня начинает болеть голова... Однообразные задания, типа иди из одной точки в другую, по поути тебе надо проходить сложные и невераятно раздражающие головоломки и отстреливаться от надоедливых противников... Капец просто. Не рекомендую покупать. Думал, что поиграю в достойную игру которую все так хвалят и любят, а на самом деле оказалась полным дерьмом. Из плюсов наверно только перонажи и графика для 2004-ого года хороша.
Это шедевр!

大四闲暇时接触了半条命2，本人没怎么玩过FPS游戏。但是！半条命真的是让我大开眼界、大呼过瘾。除了狙击其他种类的枪战基本上都有了，载具不说全面但除了飞机也基本上都涵盖了，在那个年代这真的是颗重磅炸弹啊。难度是简单，主要走剧情，结尾真心期待半条命3，让我们的戈登弗里曼博士真正成为freeman！
Шикарна!

Com a mecanica da engine source, o jogo fica bem mais fluido e divertido do que o primeiro Half-Life. Trazendo diversas inovações para o mundo dos jogos, Half-Life 2 se tornou um enorme sucesso de vendas e de crítica. Com certeza um dos melhores jogos já feitos! Vale muito a pena jogar!

[h1]Introduction/Mini Rant[/h1]
One of the most overrated games of all time. I honestly don't understand why this game gets the praise it does. No, it wasn't "revolutionary", no it isn't "the best game ever made", no it doesn't have a memorable story. This game is the living example of what BLIND fanboys will do to a game. Frankly, Valve could pull whatever bullshit out of their ass, and the fans would eat it up, claiming the game is a 11/10, with ZERO flaws. The critics would play the first level and give it perfect reviews, just like they did with another overrated, insulting, terrible sequel, known as MGS5:TPP. Why Valve hasn't released HL3 is simply beyond me. The amount of money they would make from all these fanboys is insane.

[h1]The Story[/h1]
It's terrible. One of the things people praise the game for is "storytelling", yet there is none of that in this game. Gordon gets thrown back into the action within minutes of playing the game. You walk for a little while, meet an old friend, then you're being chased by the Combine. Wow, great storytelling right there. After Gordon gets his ass kicked by two cops, a girl comes out of nowhere and saves him. Uh, okay? You walk with her, and she takes you to a safehouse where you meet up with some old friends. One of Gordon's friends tries to teleport him to Black Mesa, but his stupid alien pet ruins everything and pretty much almost gets Gordon killed and alerts the entire city. His friend is a scientist, so you would think he'd be smart enough to keep the damn animal locked up when doing stuff like that. Fast forward through all the boring and repetitive shooting galleries and driving sections... that's it, you beat the game.

I would go in depth about Episode 1 and 2, but they're equally as bad, if not WORSE. The main game and the episodes are a snooze fest. When you're not shooting things in the countless action sequences, you spend it listening to boring dialogue that puts you to sleep. And this is coming from someone who LOVES the Metal Gear Solid series, and those are notorious for their long cutscenes and Codec calls.

The characters in this game are so boring, it is pretty pathetic at times. Nobody has any emotion, and you don't care for any of the characters except for Alyx and Barney. You get more emotion out of dying in Metal Slug than you will ever get with any of the main and side characters in Half Life 2.

I would be able to look past all of these issues if the gameplay was good, but it isn't. It is just as bad as the story.

[h1]The Gameplay[/h1]
The shooting is awkward, the movement is clunky, the weapons feel weak, the human enemies rarely miss a shot, and bullets do jack shit to them unless it's a headshot. The zombie-like enemies are just as you'd expect. Slow, tanky, boring to look at. When you encounter these enemies, the game goes from shooting gallery to a "horror" section. The only thing horrific is how slow, boring, and pointless the sections are. The driving sections in the game are way too long, boring, and the vehicles drive like shit. They throw the occasional puzzle at you, but they're hilariously easy and almost pointless.

It's like someone made a list and they had to add everything that was in it. Over-the-top, overused shooting galleries? Check. Mind numbingly boring driving sections? Check. Hilariously easy puzzles? Check.

The game essentially boils down to this: kill everything in the area, move forward. Kill everything, move forward. Stop! Solve our puzzle. Okay, now go kill more stuff and rinse and repeat until the driving section. Oh, you beat the driving part? Now sit here and listen to these characters talk for a little while until you die of boredom. Oh shit, you're still alive?
Now go shoot more stuff. Rinse. And. Repeat. It really baffles me how people HATE Call of Duty for linear gameplay, but then they proceed to praise HL2 for having an "amazing" story and "revolutionary gameplay". What a sick joke.

[h1]The Final Verdict[/h1]
Don't get this game. Just don't. Buy something that is worth your time, something that you'll enjoy. Hell, take your family out to dinner, atleast you'll have a good time with them. This game is so overrated it's not even funny. The fans see this game as a masterpiece, and treat anyone who says otherwise like Hitler. This review will more than likely be BOMBED with dislikes and hate comments, but if that does happen then it just reinforces what I said.

Half Life 2 brought nothing to the table in terms of game mechanics or storytelling. MGS, Tenchu, and Thief changed and made the stealth genre popular due to their gameplay and story, which were both way ahead of their time. GTA made open world games popular, with the MASSIVE world to explore, and the gritty, dark, and sometimes even depressive storyline just made things even better. Gears of War created the perfect cover based system, that many games have adopted over the past few years. The Batman series had a perfect combat system that multiple games tried to replicate, and failed. Half Life 2 did nothing like that. This game doesn't deserve the praise it gets.

[b]5/10[/b]

12 монтировок из 10

优点:
太多了，一个十几年前的游戏到今天都还能玩，这得有多出色还需要说么？

缺点:
我在哪？我要去哪？为什么这路走不通？我要干嘛？这游戏提示太少了，我表示一大半的时间都在找路，简直要疯。

为什么给不推荐:
不是说游戏本身不好，要放10年前一定是一款惊艳的游戏，我肯定想都不想💯推荐。不过已经过了这么多年了，同类型的游戏层出不穷。而且其中不乏质量高，清晰度高，剧情好的佳作。这游戏放在这么多年后的今天已经真的只能算普通了。如果你是为了怀旧，或者为了情怀，再或者为了补票，那非常推荐。但如果你是第一次接触这个游戏的新人，还是算了吧，时间太久远了。
